name: api-gateway-lambda-authorizer
description: Lambda Authorizer for API Gateway with JWT/Cognito authentication

scripts.package: npm run build && npm install --production && zip -r lambda-authorizer.zip . -x 'src/*' '*.ts' '*.map' '*.md' 'src.zip' '.terraform/*' 'node_modules/@types/*' 'node_modules/typescript/*' 'temp_extract/*'
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name api-gateway-authorizer --zip-file fileb://lambda-authorizer.zip
